scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, identified by her halo and blue mantle, meeting Saint Elizabeth, who is older and wears a white wimple and veil. They are shown reaching out to embrace each other. Behind them, a stone building with pilasters and a crenellated top is visible, suggesting an architectural setting. The background is a deep blue sky with distant hills. The entire scene is framed by an ornate, gilded architectural arch with foliate motifs.
